references.paper_title: Scaffold: Stochastic controlled averaging for federated learning
references.reason: This paper introduces the SCAFFOLD algorithm, which is a foundation for the new algorithm proposed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Communication-efficient learning of deep networks from decentralized data
references.reason: This paper introduces federated averaging (FedAvg), a core algorithm in federated learning and a baseline for the proposed algorithm.
This paper analyzes federated learning under data heterogeneity, a key challenge addressed by the proposed algorithm.

references.paper_title: A unified analysis of federated learning with arbitrary client participation
references.reason: This paper provides a framework for analyzing federated learning under arbitrary client participation, which is relevant to the periodic client participation setting in this paper.
This paper studies a specific participation pattern (semi-cyclic) related to the periodic client participation pattern considered in this paper.
